headline: How Mercer’s New AI HR Solutions Could Shift Marsh & McLennan Companies’ (MMC) Competitive Edge
summary: In recent days, Mercer, a business of Marsh & McLennan, announced the launch of two AI-powered HR solutions: Workforce Insights and Aida, designed to provide organizations with advanced data-driven insights and benchmarking capabilities for workforce management. This move highlights Marsh & McLennan’s increasing emphasis on leveraging artificial intelligence to enhance client offerings in the rapidly evolving HR consulting space. We'll explore how the integration of AI-powered platforms at...
